title: EnglishPod 初级 英文播客 0026

segments.en: Hello, everyone, and welcome to EnglishPod.
It's December 31st, and we are on New Year's Eve.
segments.cn: 今天是12月31日，我们在迎接新年。

segments.en: That's right, and since it's New Year's Eve, we're talking about New Year's resolutions.
segments.cn: 没错，既然是新年夜，我们就来谈谈新年决心。

segments.en: In many places, it's very common to make a promise for the New Year, something that you will change.
segments.cn: 在很多地方，许多人会许下新年的承诺，改变某些事情。

segments.en: And that's what our dialogue is about today, so why don't we take a look at our vocabulary preview for this lesson.
segments.cn: 这就是我们今天对话的主题，为什么我们不先看看本课的词汇预览呢。

segments.en: Okay, on vocabulary preview today, we only have one word.
segments.cn: 好的，今天的词汇预览只有一个词。
那么，饮食习惯是什么呢？

segments.en: So if you eat healthy, or if you eat lots of unhealthy food.
segments.cn: 比如你吃得健康，或者吃很多不健康的食物。

segments.en: Or even maybe what time you eat, right?
segments.cn: 甚至可能是你吃东西的时间，对吧？

segments.en: If you eat every day at a certain time.
segments.cn: 如果你每天在某个时间吃东西。

segments.en: So we're ready to listen to our dialogue today.
segments.cn: 所以我们准备好听今天的对话了。

segments.en: And it's going to be a little bit fast, but don't worry about it.
We'll come back and explain all of the key vocabulary after.
segments.cn: 我们会在之后回来解释所有的关键词汇。

segments.en: So, did I tell you about my New Year's resolution?
segments.cn: 那么，我告诉过你我的新年决心吗？

segments.en: I've decided to go on a diet.
And you're going to completely transform your eating habits, right?
segments.cn: 你要完全改变你的饮食习惯，对吧？

segments.en: I'm going to cut out all the junk I eat.
segments.cn: 我要戒掉我吃的所有垃圾食品。

segments.en: But this time, I'm going to stick to it.
Trust me, Carol, I'm going to be a new man in one year's time.
segments.cn: 相信我，Carol，一年后我会变成一个新的人。

segments.en: Well, I guess we'll just have to wait and see.
segments.cn: 好吧，我想我们只能等着看了。

segments.en: Do we have any chips left?
So Marco, do you think this guy will be successful in changing his eating habits?
segments.cn: 所以Marco，你觉得这个家伙能成功改变他的饮食习惯吗？

segments.en: Well, I guess he'll never change, but this gives us a great opportunity to look at some great vocabulary in this lesson in Language Takeaway.
segments.cn: 嗯，我想他永远不会改变，但这给我们提供了一个很好的机会来学习本课的词汇。

segments.en: Language Takeaway Our first word on Language Takeaway is junk.
segments.cn: 语言收获 我们的第一个词是垃圾。

segments.en: So junk comes from junk food.
Okay, our second word for Language Takeaway, transform.
segments.cn: 好的，我们的第二个词是转变。

segments.en: So this guy is going to transform his eating habits.
segments.cn: 所以这个家伙要转变他的饮食习惯。

segments.en: He's going to change his eating habits.
segments.cn: 他要改变他的饮食习惯。
是的，我们的第三个词是？

segments.en: So we have some great examples on how we can use stuffed, and you'll get the meaning from it.
segments.cn: 所以我们有一些很好的例子来说明如何使用“吃饱”，你会明白它的意思。

segments.en: Come on, have one more piece of cake.
Oh, I ate way too much.
The feeling you get if you eat too much food.
Alright, so these are some great words that you can use talking about food.
segments.cn: 好吧，这些是一些很好的词汇，可以用来谈论食物。

segments.en: And now we can listen to our dialogue a second time, and this time, like always, it's going to be slow.
segments.cn: 现在我们可以再听一次我们的对话，这次，像往常一样，会慢一些。

segments.en: So did I tell you about my New Year's resolution?
segments.cn: 那么，我告诉过你我的新年决心吗？

segments.en: I've decided to go on a diet.
And you're going to completely transform your eating habits, right?
segments.cn: 你要完全改变你的饮食习惯，对吧？

segments.en: I'm going to cut out all that junk I eat.
segments.cn: 我要戒掉我吃的所有垃圾食品。

segments.en: But this time, I'm going to stick to it.
I'm going to be a new man in one year's time.
segments.cn: 一年后我会变成一个新的人。

segments.en: Well, I guess we'll just have to wait and see.
Do we have any chips left?
There's a lot of great language in this dialogue, isn't there?
segments.cn: 这个对话中有很多很棒的表达，不是吗？

segments.en: Yeah, a lot of great language that we can take a look at with our fluency builder.
segments.cn: 是的，有很多我们可以用流利度提升工具来学习的好表达。

segments.en: The first phrase we have for you is...
segments.cn: 我们为你准备的第一个短语是...

segments.en: Yes, we've got some examples of how this phrase is used, so let's listen.
segments.cn: 是的，我们有一些这个短语的使用例子，来听听吧。

segments.en: I can't solve this math problem.
segments.cn: 我无法解决这个数学问题。

segments.en: Even though English learning can be hard... You should stick to it.
segments.cn: 即使学习英语可能很困难... 你也应该坚持下去。

segments.en: Okay, let's look at our second phrase for fluency builder.
segments.cn: 好吧，让我们看看流利度提升工具的第二个短语。

segments.en: Well, this is a great way of saying... I'm serious.
segments.cn: 好吧，这是一种很好的表达方式... 我是认真的。

segments.en: And our final phrase in fluency builder.
segments.cn: 这是我们流利度提升工具中的最后一个短语。

segments.en: Again, we've got some examples of this phrase as native speakers use it.
segments.cn: 再次，我们有一些这个短语的例子，看看母语者是如何使用的。

segments.en: You have to cut out the salt from your diet.
segments.cn: 你必须从饮食中戒掉盐。

segments.en: It's time for me to focus on my work.
segments.cn: 我是时候专注于我的工作了。

segments.en: I'm going to cut out everything else from my life.
segments.cn: 我打算把生活中的其他事情都戒掉。

segments.en: Okay, some great language, some great phrases in our dialogue today.
segments.cn: 好吧，今天对话中有一些很棒的表达和短语。

segments.en: So, why don't we listen to it a third time and we'll come back in a little bit.
segments.cn: 那么，为什么我们不再听第三遍，然后稍后再回来呢？

segments.en: So, did I tell you about my New Year's resolution?
segments.cn: 那么，我告诉过你我的新年决心吗？

segments.en: I've decided to go on a diet.
And you're going to completely transform your eating habits, right?
segments.cn: 你将完全改变你的饮食习惯，对吧？

segments.en: I'm going to cut out all the junk I eat.
segments.cn: 我打算戒掉我吃的所有垃圾食品。

segments.en: But this time, I'm going to stick to it.
Trust me, Carol, I'm going to be a new man in one year's time.
segments.cn: 相信我，卡罗尔，我会在一年内变成一个新的人。

segments.en: Well, I guess we'll just have to wait and see.
Do we have any chips left?
Okay, so New Year's resolution is a really common and popular thing in North America.
segments.cn: 好吧，新年决心在北美是一个非常普遍和流行的事情。

segments.en: It's tradition to make a promise to yourself on New Year's and stick to it throughout the whole year.
segments.cn: 在新年时向自己许下承诺，并在整年坚持下去是传统。

segments.en: But the funny thing is that very few people actually stick to their New Year's resolution.
segments.cn: 但有趣的是，实际上很少有人能坚持他们的新年决心。

segments.en: The most common ones are, I'm going to quit smoking.
segments.cn: 最常见的决心是，我要戒烟。

segments.en: I'm going to go on a diet.

segments.cn: 这几乎也从来不会发生。

segments.en: On New Year's Eve, you start drinking.
And another really common one is, I'm going to join a gym.
segments.cn: 还有一个很常见的就是，我要去健身房。

segments.en: That's why gym membership sales are so high in January.
segments.cn: 这就是为什么一月份健身房会员销售这么高。

segments.en: Everyone joins a gym in January, but... Come February?
segments.cn: 每个人在一月份都去健身房，但... 到了二月份呢？

segments.en: Yeah, and very few people in the gym.
segments.cn: 是的，健身房里的人很少。

segments.en: Yeah, so Marco, do you have a New Year's resolution for this year?
segments.cn: 是的，马尔科，你今年有新年决心吗？

segments.en: Yes, I have a New Year's resolution, and I resolve to continue bringing everyone some great lessons.
segments.cn: 有，我有一个新年决心，我决心继续给大家带来一些很棒的课程。

segments.en: And I think I can stick to that one.
segments.cn: 我觉得我可以坚持这个。

segments.en: Yes, well, I do hope that you do stick to that one, Marco.
segments.cn: 是的，我希望你能坚持这个，马尔科。

segments.en: We will, we will, but today we're out of time, so please go to our website and leave all your questions and comments.
segments.cn: 我们会的，我们会的，但今天时间不够了，请访问我们的网站，留下你的问题和评论。

segments.en: And we'll see you there, but until then, it's... Bye!
segments.cn: 我们在那里见，但在此之前，再见！
